modName: BodySlide - Vanilla Outfits For All UNP Variants
summary:
MODDERS RESOURCE
Sliders for all vanilla armors - UNP
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=5][b]Many Thanks to (REQUIRED SOFTWARE!):[/b][/size][/color][list][*][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686/?][color=#ffff00]Caliente[/color][/url][color=#ffff00]﻿[/color][/b] for [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?][color=#ffff00]Body Slide 2 & Outfit Studio[/color][/url][color=#ffff00]﻿[/color][/b][/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]

[size=5][color=#00ff00][b]SLIDERS CONSTANTLY UPDATED![/b][/color]

[/size][color=#ff0000][size=5][b]Description:[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]Those sliders allow you to convert any vanilla armor and clothes to whatever UNP body you want (UNP, UNPB, Top Model, Dream Girl, SevenBase, Skinny, Curvy and so on).
They are alredy been prepared by me (conformed and weighted) you only have to generate nifs through bodyslide and face normals.
End of the work.

PS: Please this is a very time consuming mod, if it should be something not working please tell me via PM or via comment in the forum or in the mod page, so i can fix all problems before continuing the conversion![/size]

[b][color=#ff0000][size=5]Installation:[/size][/color][/b]

[size=3]Copy - Paste the archive content inside the bodyslide root folder.
[/size]
[size=3]Here's also the tutorial i made to convert a mesh from scratch. I'm not english mothertongue, so deal with it ;)[/size]

[youtube]U_jG5Arpuhs[/youtube]
author: Quadrefoil
